smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (this and i) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this and i
Parentheses in (this and i) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: this and i
Parentheses in ("$_id:$timestamp") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: "$_id:$timestamp"
Parentheses in (retweet_id ?: id) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: retweet_id ?: id
Parentheses in (item.isFollowing == true) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: item.isFollowing == true
Parentheses in (whereConditions + extraWhere) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: whereConditions + extraWhere
Parentheses in (0..65535) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: 0..65535
Parentheses in (requestCode and 0xFF00) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: requestCode and 0xFF00
Parentheses in (position + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: position + 1
Parentheses in ((position + 1) shl 8) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (position + 1) shl 8
Parentheses in (Math.abs(offset).toFloat() / swipeContainer.height) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Math.abs(offset).toFloat() / swipeContainer.height
Parentheses in (value) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: value
Parentheses in (countIndex.toLong() shl 32) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: countIndex.toLong() shl 32
Parentheses in (countIndex.toLong() shl 32) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: countIndex.toLong() shl 32
Parentheses in (countIndex.toLong() shl 32) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: countIndex.toLong() shl 32

Parentheses in (width <= this.maxWidth && height <= this.maxHeight) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: width <= this.maxWidth && height <= this.maxHeight
